SEARCH
Package Presentation

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.UserController
@Component public class UserController extends Object
Controller for the user dashboard.

Handles borrowing, returning, searching items, paying fines, and viewing user info.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      @Autowired public UserController(LogoutService logoutService, FxmlNavigator fxmlNavigator, MediaItemSearchService mediaItemSearchService, MediaItemService mediaItemService, AllCdService allCdService, LocalSessionManager sessionManager, BorrowService borrowService, ReturnItemService returnService, UserBorrowedItemsService userBorrowedItemsService, UserRepository userRepository, GetUserBalanceService getUserBalanceService, FineService fineService)
      Creates the user controller with required services.
      Parameters:
      logoutService - service used to log out the current user
      fxmlNavigator - navigator utility for switching between FXML scenes
      mediaItemSearchService - service for searching media items
      mediaItemService - service for general media item operations
      allCdService - service to retrieve all CDs
      sessionManager - manager for the current user session
      borrowService - service handling borrow operations
      returnService - service handling return operations
      userBorrowedItemsService - service for querying user borrowed items
      userRepository - repository for user entities
      getUserBalanceService - service to read user fine balance
      fineService - service to calculate and pay fines
